turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Ordering at a café “Hi, I would like to order a coffee today!”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure! What kind of coffee would you like today?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I would like to have a cup of cappuccino, please, with oat milk. Thank you.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it — one oat milk cappuccino. Would you like it hot or iced?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Like a hot please

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, a hot oat milk cappuccino. Would you like any sugar or sweetener with that?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I don't want sugar or sweetener. Thank you.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No problem! What size would you like — small, medium, or large?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I would like a large please .

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, a large hot oat milk cappuccino. Would you like anything to eat with your coffee, like a pastry or sandwich?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Which sandwich do you have?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: We’ve got ham and cheese, chicken pesto, and a veggie option with roasted peppers and hummus. Would you like to try one of those?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I'm not sure. Maybe I would like to add chicken pesto, please 4/4

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great choice — the chicken pesto is really tasty. Would you like your sandwich heated or cold?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I would like my sandwich a little toaster, please.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure thing, I’ll have it lightly toasted for you. Are you having your order here or taking it to go?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Takeaway, please.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, one large hot oat milk cappuccino and a lightly toasted chicken pesto sandwich to go. Would you like a receipt with your order?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Yes, and I want to additional one small latte, thank you.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it — adding one small latte. Would you like regular milk in your latte, or a different type?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Please add almond milk.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure, a small almond milk latte added. Would you like that one hot or iced?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Please hot and please give me a receipt and how much in total

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright — one large hot oat milk cappuccino, one lightly toasted chicken pesto sandwich, and one small hot almond milk latte, all to go with a receipt. The total comes to $14.80. How would you like to pay — card or cash?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Pay with card. Thank you.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, you can tap your card right here when you’re ready. Thanks a lot — your order will be ready in just a few minutes. Have a great day!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Thank you. Have a good one.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Thanks! You too — enjoy your coffee and sandwich!
